entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 a.m. ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:35 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:35 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 12:35 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
